title: Club filter
summary: In mathematics, particularly in set theory, if κ {\displaystyle \kappa } is a regular uncountable cardinal then club ⁡ ( κ ) , {\displaystyle \operatorname {club} (\kappa ),} the filter of all sets containing a club subset of κ , {\displaystyle \kappa ,} is a κ {\displaystyle \kappa } -complete filter closed under diagonal intersection called the club filter.
